Job Description: Roles and Responsibilities:    Here are some things you can expect in your job:       Design:   You ll be working on designing and architecting robust and scalable products and systems     Development Testing:   You ll be developing software for real projects and products, and testing to ensure its of the highest quality.     Learning   : Lots of it! You will be learning a lot and applying what you ve learnt.     Analysis:   You ll analyse the different ways to achieve an objective and articulate the one best-suited for the need     Mentoring:   You ll get opportunities to mentor team members and also get mentored     Share and Present:   You ll get opportunities to present your analysis, share your viewpoints and showcase what you ve built     Deploy   : You ll be setting up environments and deploying software     Document   : You ll organise your work using documents and other artefacts     Communicate   : You ll use a combination of tools to stay connected and aligned with the team.      Pre-requisites:       Experience   : 2-4 years experience in a relevant role     Technical Skills   :    Proficient with Java or Python    Experience working with web frameworks    Knowledge of Javascript, CSS, and Javascript frameworks    Good knowledge of relational databases    Exposure to Unix/Linux platforms    Experience using Git or other source control systems    [Optional] Exposure to CMSs (WordPress etc.) and eCommerce platforms (Magento, WooCommerce)    [Optional] Experience working with NoSQL solutions    [Optional] Knowledge of AWS or other Cloud platforms    [Optional] Knowledge of Web Services    [Optional] Familiarity with Agile practices       Soft Skills   :    Willingness to work on varied technologies, platforms and frameworks    Curiosity and being a fast learner    Good communication skills, both spoken and written    Be a team player    Be able to own things independently.       Laptop   : Should have your own laptop     Phone and Stable Internet connection   : This position will require remote collaboration so a stable internet connection and communication tools like WhatsApp, Skype/Google Meet will be required.
